definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: swear, curse (cf. I. [[אלה]] ? so Thes Lag:Or ii. 3)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 1Ki 8:31 ( = 2Ch 6:22 all Vrss Th Bö Bä Kp reading [[וְאָלָה]]); [[אָלִית]] Ju Jdg 17:2; Inf. abs. [[אָלֽה]] Ho 4:2; [[אָלוֹת]] Ho 10:4.
swear, take oath before God 1Ki 8:31 ( = 2Ch 6:22); in covenants Ho 4:2, Ho 10:4 (falsely).

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Impf. [[וַיּאֶׁל]] 1Sa 14:24; Inf. [[לְהַאֲלֽתוֹ]] 1Ki 8:31 = 2Ch 6:22 adjure, put under oath.
